item.title: Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in Lebanon kills 13 people
item.description: An Israeli airstrike on a Palestinian refugee camp in southern Lebanon on Tuesday killed 13 people and wounded several others, state media and government officials said.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Can weed help you drink less? Scientists study how well 'California sober' works
item.description: It's trendy in some circles to replace drinking with consuming cannabis. But can it help people with a drinking problem cut back? Scientists set up a bar in the lab to find out.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Texas appeals ruling that Trump-urged voting map is racial gerrymandering
item.description: A federal court in El Paso ruled that the redistricting backed by Trump and Republicans to reshape the map for the 2026 midterms was based on race, not just political advantage for the GOP.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Farewell, fair penny. You are finished, but never forgotten
item.description: This tiny disc of zinc with just a smidge of copper has played an outsized role in our national (and international) discourse. The U.S. Mint ended production of the one-cent coin last week.
